post.body: I'm blushing. :- )
Target is saucier than Walmart so you're still cool. :- )
You need to buy a hamper. :- )
Bad Case of Lovin' You isn't bad. Neither is Werewolves of London. The Takin' Care of Business? I blame his Canadian genes.
Best to have Cliff notes on hand, if possible. Complicated...like Dostoevsky.
Look at those doe eyes. She's beautiful!
Looks pretty!
I will try that!
It just needed to be said. And it comes from a place of love. :-)
Oooh..evil incarnate. Rocky Mountain HELL!
Sorry to have to tell you this, Damien, I mean , Julia. You are the Twitter antiChrist. Have a good one.
Just watched the Seinfeld on Letterman birthday party bit. That was a riot! :-)
Exactly!
I haven't heard of that one. I will check it out. Thanks!
Manity. Yeah. That's way more masculine. :- )
Thanks, Mike. Now I have a wonderful list to investigate. Helps to narrow down the enormous selection. (You have a vanity? :-) )
Good idea!
It has kind of a nice ring to it...:-)
Twice today & dinner from Swiss Chalet? You sure know how to hurt a girl, doncha? :-)
I know you need room for a bass cabinet but your mantra should be "fuel economy".
Oh...you had to mention Swiss Chalet. Sigh. Next you'll be taunting me with Tim's.
How cute is that? :- )
@BradHart It *is*, however, a resource I would expect to see in mine. :-p
require large gloves and shoes?
Exercises in futility are how I keep fit! :-)
That's okay. It had to said.
I'm forming one right now. Hoping to play out by late spring.
In 2009, I vow to be more accepting of other Tweeple's differences.. Either that or complain about them behind their backs. :-)
I'd think it was more legit. Image is important too. I just find it a tad suspicious when a photo is the first/only request.
Great! They're really cute & not expensive - mostly for short-term wear. I'm going to take the chance! Love shoes/boots!Thank!
Where did you order from? Do you know anything about Victoria's Secret boots? Found a pair I love but IDK about quality.
Yup. Wondering if his 2nd choice might have been "Love the One You're With". :- )
I'm giggling thinking about the guy you mentioned who chose "I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For" as his wedding song.
Getting ready to light a fire. Oh, and that's not a euphemism for sex. Then, I'm going to baste the pot roast. That is. :- )
WB just announced his new favorite songs:Taking Care of Business, Bad Case of Loving you & Werewolves of London. Hmm..not sure how to feel.
http://twitpic.com/svu3 - Note the sign. Our Xmas tree came from Booger Mtn, NC, which, btw, was the original title of Charles Frazier's ...
Barnes & Nobles to buy Malcolm Gladwell's new book, Outliers.
At the airport. WB is excited & challenging me to answer questions about vapour trails & principles of lift thus corfirming I'm a moron.
Damn, my BB can't upload to Twitpic otherwise you'd see why I started this discussion.
And the beard with no moustache...well, do I even have to explain that? I didn't like the look the first time I saw it...on Abe Lincoln.
Note to men: you know I love you but please refrain from just wearing a moustache only. It's very 70s porno. Moustache/goatee look is great.
Going to go have lunch and then to the RDU (airport) observation deck then...who knows?
My Wise Man just came home bearing Nyquil. Says it was one of the lesser known gifts of the Magi. Beats the hell out of myrrh. WTF is myrrh?
Family back in Canada is unhappy we're not coming home for Xmas. Can't rationalize paying $3000 for the pleasure of lake effect snowsqualls.
Yellow Ledbetter on the radio. Sweet.
Check please.
Oops. Meant to text and I tweeted instead!
What kind of music are you playing tonight?
Best $10 gift. Starbucks travel mugs made from 28% post-consumer recycled material. Come with a coupon for a free SB beverage. Also 20% off.
It's getting ugly here in Shoppingland. I will remain cheerful. I will remain cheerful. I will remain cheerful.
She thought I was leaving not arriving & evidently waited for spot. It seemed to tick her off more when I wished her a Merry Christmas.
Some frumpy Haus Frau just cursed at me b/c I sat in my car & finished a conversation with my terminally ill brother before getting out.
Weather permitting, we'll have the annual luminaria display in our neighborhood. It's always a lovely spectacle & supports a good cause.
Wow! Thanks for recommendations, everyone. My phone was chirping happily with all the DMs too! Twitter ROCKS! :- )
Gentleman, I need your help! I must choose a cologne for my husband but have a terrible cold. I'd be grateful for your recommendations. :-)
Signing off for a bit. I need to go and rub my chicken. #notaeuphemismforsex
Sorting through my Craigslist musician responses. Deleting those who asked for a photo & not a demo. Looking for a singer or a date? Buhbye.
What have I done to deserve this beautiful, amazing boy who looks at me w/such adoration? We're holding hands & singing softly at SB. Wow.
This is very exciting esp. to a History major like me. CNN: Ridley Scott had opening scene from Gladiator dead on. http://is.gd/eCnh
